main event: Multiple sightings of unidentified lights in the Yakima, Bremerton, and Bellingham areas over a span of several hours on July 21, 1959.
interesting points: Witnesses included sheriff's deputies and police officers observing the lights for three hours,The lights exhibited strange maneuvers, including hovering and rapid acceleration,Reports were received indicating that the objects could not be photographed as they would shut off their lights when approached,Different colored lights (red, green, white, blue, yellow) were reported during the sightings,No radar confirmation of the sightings was obtained by military personnel.
witness description: Sheriff's deputies and police officers in the area
